headlines.description: Liverpool claimed a tense 1-0 win over Newcastle at an electric St James' Park on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool edge Newcastle to keep title hopes alive

headlines.description: — Norwich was relegated from the English Premier League after Dean Smith’s return to Aston Villa ended in a 2-0 defeat on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Norwich relegated from EPL after losing at Aston Villa 2-0

headlines.description: — Wilfried Zaha came off the bench to score a stoppage-time winner for Crystal Palace against Southampton in the English Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Zaha nets late as Palace fights back to beat Southampton 2-1

headlines.description: Jack Cork and Josh Brownhill both scored late goals as Burnley beat second-from-bottom Watford 2-1 in a pulsating Premier League relegation battle.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burnley bounce back to beat Watford 2-1 in relegation thriller

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Wolverhampton Wanderers

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion earned an emphatic 3-0 win over a sluggish Wolverhampton Wanderers at Molineux on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton outclass Wolves in impressive 3-0 victory

headlines.description: Manchester City stormed to a comfortable 4-0 win over Leeds United at Elland Road on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City reclaim Prem lead after win over Leeds
